website_summaries.verdict: A budget-friendly, flexible lamp that fills a variety of functional and decorative lighting needs.
pros: Adjustable lamps can be pointed in virtually any direction
cons: No dimmer switch or three-way bulb capacity
Plastic shades are not as decorative as some competitors

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp
customer_reviews.text: This lamp looks good and works well. I have had one for about 2 months now and just ordered a 2nd. I saw other review that talked about the switches breaking, I have only used the switches a few times since I have it plugged into a switched outlet, but they seem sturdy enough to me, basically the same as any lamp I have ever used. These allow more light through than the kind that have metal hoods around the lights so I recommend this over the all metal ones.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: With smart bulbs, highly granular control.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my office and it works great with the 3 Phillips Hue bulbs. I control the bulbs independently of each other as well as as all 3 together as part of the room. Nice for a little light I can turn on one bulb at 25% or for a lot of light all three at 100% and anything in between. Directing each one in different directions allows me to direct light where I need it or flood the room.
customer_reviews.author: tomb523Top Contributor: Smart Home

customer_reviews.title: Excellent floor lamp
customer_reviews.text: Excellent floor lamp! We were looking for a floor lamp to put in our daughter's playroom. When i found this one on Amazon I wasn't sure what it will look like in real life since the price is low in comparison to other floor lamps I checked. I decided to give it a try and ordered. I was pleasantly surprised when it came. Super easy to put together took me less than 5 min to set it up. Provides a lot of lighting and you can point lights in different directions. We are happy with pur purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Janna

customer_reviews.title: fell apart
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these lamps and was very happy until recently. I moved one lamp to vacuum and the bottom fell off and the "concrete" type material used in the base fell out and shattered. The lamp is now useless because it won't stand upright and I can't figure out a way to fix it. This is especially frustrating because I bought 3 so that all of the lamps in the room would match. I contacted Amazon but they don't have any warranty information on this product. I have not been able to find any contact info for the vendor or manufacturer. I hope that one of them will read this and contact me.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine O'Neill

customer_reviews.title: Targeted light for my office plants
customer_reviews.text: I put some sunlight bulbs in this to take to my office to keep my plants alive in my no-window office. I love that I can move the heads around to target the light. The plants are happy, it helps with the light factor (seasonal affective issues), and several clients have stated, “I thought that was a window behind me.” Super easy to put together, great value
customer_reviews.author: J.F.

customer_reviews.title: Mine works fine, was easy to assemble and as a night-time ...
customer_reviews.text: The lamp shades are kinda cheezy plastic, but you can't beat the price for this style of floor lamp. Mine works fine, was easy to assemble and as a night-time task light for handwork, it's doing just what I need it to do. As others have commented though, even the shortest of bulbs stick out beyond the ends of the shades, so when they are on, they do make visual hot-spots that are kind of annoying. Would have been nice if the manufacturer had made them just 1" longer. Otherwise, nice lamp.
customer_reviews.author: la critique

customer_reviews.title: This light was perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This light was perfect for what I needed. We converted a bedroom on our lower floor (live in bi-level) where there are three windows but not much light as they are covered with bushes. I had two lamps that just did not do it if you really needed light. These were the missing link! I like that most of the time I have just one light lit and can direct light where needed. I did not have a problem with the switches. For the price it is very practical and looks very nice in the room.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllisanne

customer_reviews.title: I love lamp!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is very useful. I have two of them. Since my bedrooms don't have ceiling lights, I have one in my office and one in my spare bedroom. They are very functional, and they light up those rooms quite nicely. I decided to not purchase one for my living room simply because of the fact that the directional lighting is not very conducive to watching television. I may, however, buy a third one for my master bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan J. KautzmanTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Weird plastic residue melted on, impossible to remove
customer_reviews.text: This would be five stars if not for the weird plastic residue that was melted onto one of the domes of this lamp when I received it. The lamp is very sturdy, and it looks and works great—but even after twenty minutes of messing with the packaging, I could not get this burnt-on plastic sludge off of the lamp. At least the spot was small, so I could keep the residue hidden against the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Highest value possible for the price point
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to the Amazon reviewers who brought me to this lamp! I've purchased hundreds of lamps in my lifetime. If you are looking for one that is durable and not bad looking for a good price, this is the one. In my case, I am using this lamp with grow lights to help my patio plants stay happy during the winter. I am very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Let there be light!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality standing light tree. I really like the shades on this lamp as they are made of glass and not plastic. The lamp was easy to put together, it looks great, and can direct the light where you need it to go. This product by Boston Harbor was just what we needed for our room.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: A good sturdy lamp
customer_reviews.text: I have found this lamp to be a terrific bargain. You look at the price and you don't expect much but I have found the lamp to look nice, to be sturdy and switch on and off easily. The look is a bit Spartan but the chrome finish is good, no defects on any I've looked at. I originally bought three lamps, then 2 more and today 2 more. That's a total of 7 lamps. Yes I'd o need a lot of lighting butt each lamp itself with the three 60 Watt bulbs ( I'm using Hyperkerion bulbs) has plenty of light. So far I've been very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: GBN

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Functional and solid. I needed light by my bed so I have a reading light bulbs, a red bulb, and a green bulb. They turn on off I which is nice. I put together in a few minutes it was easy to screw the metal rods together. The base is pretty heavy so it is sturdy and the unit feels durable. I love having a night light and a reading light at my fingertips.
customer_reviews.author: 1Thand

customer_reviews.title: Great for adding a lot of light!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is fantastic. Adds a ton of light to a dark room. It looks and feels more expensive than it actually is. It doesn't feel cheap and look like a dorm-room light like most IKEA lamps. And LED bulbs look great in it!
customer_reviews.author: ResearchBeforeBuying

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and looks good for this price point. Throws a lot of light! The top lamp CANNOT be pointed up. The highest angle is straight out at 90degrees from the pole. The two lower lights can be rotated up or down.
customer_reviews.author: Catharine

customer_reviews.title: Delightfully Surprised !
customer_reviews.text: After reading several reviews I was sceptical about ordering this Boston Harbor lamp. I ordered it anyway and was delightfully surprised when it arrived inside a very sturdy box that Amazon always uses in shipping and was in perfect condition. It took very little time to assemble. The switch is good on each lamp.This tree lamp is very pretty, even prettier than the picture. When we need another I'll order this same one.
customer_reviews.author: B3Sisters

customer_reviews.title: Well made, well packaged.
customer_reviews.text: Solid and well built. Easy to assemble. Not crazy about the plastic shades, but because of the reviews, that was no surprise. They are fine for my home office and the brushed nickel matches other items I have purchased. If it had some other type of shade I'd give it 5 stars. I believe this is the reason it is rated for 60 watt bulbs, but with LED lights the heat is much less of a constraint. I want my work area bright!
customer_reviews.author: DJinDE

customer_reviews.title: Tower of Pisa
customer_reviews.text: Like many of these types of standing lamps, they tilt (dangerously) after the heavy base material dries up and cracks/falls apart. Then they fall, crashing into and destroying everything in their path.
customer_reviews.author: Mikel

customer_reviews.title: Great for Indirect Lighting. Point Them Upwards.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to my apartment. I have all of the lights pointing to the ceiling and up towards the walls which makes for excellent indirect lighting. I am not blinding myself when I look up to turn it on/off. I could not have made a better choice.
customer_reviews.author: Miller

customer_reviews.title: beware of non alignment with the rod grooves
customer_reviews.text: The grooves in the third rod were not straight, making it impossible to connect the entire pole fully without it being slightly crooked. I decided to keep the lamp instead of returning since it does cost money to return a package and I managed to set the lamp straight with having the grooves exposed. Overall I'd say this product is more cheaply made than expected.

customer_reviews.title: Everything seems sturdy in all the right places
customer_reviews.text: Everything seems sturdy in all the right places. The plastic shades diffuse the light to a greater area which was why I chose this lamp. However, if you were to put 100 watt incandescent bulbs in it (it's only rated fire 60 watt) the plastick shades look like they would melt or even catch on fire. That last part is probably why it's banned in CA. I use 60 watt led daylight bulbs in mine and it fills my needs quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Matt S.

customer_reviews.title: It is a sturdy lamp and looks quite stylish and sleek
customer_reviews.text: This lamp gives off a lot of light. I needed more lighting in my living room and this design did the trick. It is a sturdy lamp and looks quite stylish and sleek.
customer_reviews.author: Donesha Pegues

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lamp for any room
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Bright. 3 lights with easy on/off switches. Adjustable lamp heads for any direction. A breeze to assemble. What more could you ask for in a lamp? I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Creative Doodler

customer_reviews.title: Second one a Success
customer_reviews.text: My original purchase had to be returned as it had missing parts and didn't fit together well. This second one is exactly what I needed. Since it doesn't come with bulbs I installed LED Bright White ones and it is very very bright now in a corner that an older lamp I was using use to be in. Return to Amazon was a snap and so far I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mark3pi

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good, easy to assemble and yes, very stable due to heavy base
customer_reviews.author: AV

customer_reviews.title: Good working lamp
customer_reviews.text: The lamp arrived on time and was easy to put together. Overall it looks nice and is good quality for the price. I was worried about it being wobbly during assembly and the toggle switch breaking but this lamp proved itself quite sturdy and well balanced. Depending on what type of bulb you get this lamp can emit a lot of light, I don't even have to turn on all the lamp lights on for it to light up my living room (which is a pretty decent size space). I do however wish it had glass lamp shades instead of plastic but again for the price I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: Arrived defective - don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: The bottom piece did not have a threaded attachment to screw/assemble the piece. Given that it was a dorm move-in, we lost the packaging in the chaos and could not return. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: RE

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Lamp and Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp, it looks great in our living room. Gives great lighting and you can change the direction of the lights.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores

customer_reviews.title: ... for Christmas as he lives in an apartment with poor lighting and he really likes it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp for my son for Christmas as he lives in an apartment with poor lighting and he really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Dori B.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Modern Stable
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. My plants are going to love the light coming from here. Easy to assemble, 10 min. Sturdy, good quality material. The stainless steel look is a Modern style.
customer_reviews.author: PR_Sea_ Breeze

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Received an unfinished lamp today and wasted lot of time assembly but ended up not working. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Monstera Lover

customer_reviews.title: A good lamp
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was easy and the finished product looks exactly as advertised. This lamp was much cheaper than similar lamps available through other sellers and looks just as nice, I'd definitely recommend it if your room doesn't have enough overhead lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: good lamp for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: have been using this for months now and am happy with my purchase. shades are plastic but i knew that when ordering. i have had no problems at all with it being stable and not wobbling. all the switches are still working fine and i find the angling of the shades much better than previous lamps i have had.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: This was a good decision
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of this brushed silver lamp. Like all tree lamps, it shines where it is pointed, although I think this one seems to be easier to aim. The large plastic shades really let the light spread. I have vision problems, and require a lot of light. This lamp is beside my bed and is on all day; one pointed to the ceiling; another at my nightstand, and the third goes on when I need extra light.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Ryun

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye Dark Room Corners
customer_reviews.text: This is a very decorative lamp at a great price. It assembles easily without tools, stands sturdily and uses energy efficient 60 watt equivalent bulbs. I would give it 5-stars except for the fact that the lamp shades are plastic and the lamps don't have sufficient range of adjustment for my use. Overall its a great buy to cure that dark corner in a room issue.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lukomski

customer_reviews.title: Solid, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp, I use mine with daylight bulbs & a timer to help wake me up in the morning
customer_reviews.author: M. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and functional lamp
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp more than I expected to. It is sturdy; it doesn't tilt; it happily accepts LED bulbs; the lamps are on useful joints and can be positioned to whatever suits the task you're working on. It's also very attractive. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: clanmackay

customer_reviews.title: Clean look, and just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this lamp. Easy assembly, perfect height, convenient adjustment options, clean look, good fit and finish on the one I received. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Big D of VA

customer_reviews.title: Plastic shades melted
customer_reviews.text: plastic shade fell loose over light bulb and melted onto bulb! YIKS
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job
customer_reviews.text: I love that lamp. It has three balls but they can each switch on and of individually, and they are flexible so you can aim them to different directions. This lamp does a great job lighting up a room
customer_reviews.author: Gili abro

customer_reviews.title: Solid floor lamp for the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Came in a small package. Appears to be made well, the satin finish looks good. The lights can be positioned in many angles, so should cover a good sized area.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Reasonable and sturdy. Love the fact that the lights are adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Torres

customer_reviews.title: Good product but can not contact company.
customer_reviews.text: The product is fine. However it’s frustrating trying to figure out how to contact the manufacturer to order a replacement plastic globe. I broke one on a previous purchase and can not communicate with Boston Harbor to find out if I can buy a new globe. Maddening!
customer_reviews.author: G. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Design
customer_reviews.text: Unit performs as expected. Enjoy the translucent light shrouds as they allow light to be dispersed well.
customer_reviews.author: Steve O

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Quality Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful light easy to put together and lights up a room without a problem. I love that I can adjust the amounts of light depending on how many I can turn on. And the nickel color looks beautiful and expensive even with the plastic white shades.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: I use this in our dark basement - it's excellent! Point the light where ever you need it. Need more light turn on a 2 light. Great for general use. Good quality and good looking. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: sptrsn

customer_reviews.title: Piece o' Junk won't stay together
customer_reviews.text: The pole is in pieces that screw together, but some of them did not fit together and couldn't be tightened. I even tried putting Teflon tape on the threads, but noooooo. Not a small defect. If I can get it back in the box it's going back. (If it went together it'd look nice, so it gets 2 stars.)
customer_reviews.author: gmoo

customer_reviews.title: Great Floor Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Love this floor lamp. Very easy to assemble. Solid base for use on carpet and the directional lighting is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: KarlaQ

customer_reviews.title: Nice Floor Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Perfect standing lamp for my daughters dorm room. Easy to put together. Heavy base so it stays upright. Good light output with the three lights. The heads turn easily to change the direction of the light. Seems well made. I like it enough to buy another one for my craft room.
customer_reviews.author: tanderson100

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Loving this lamp. It's beautiful, sturdy and bright using the LED bulbs, 10w 800 lumens.
customer_reviews.author: A.

customer_reviews.title: This is a perfect sturdy lamp
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect sturdy lamp. The base is wide enough and super heavy so no tilting or falling over. Although the shades are plastic they look like frosted glass. Three 60 watt bulbs light the whole room. The electric wire is reasonably long. Easy to put together, you won't even need to glance at the instructions. It stands just the right height so that I can turn it off without having to get up from my Lazyboy.
customer_reviews.author: srstange

customer_reviews.title: Lamp was perfect for what we needed
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is so easy to assemble. You can tell the lamp isn't expensive, but it is so practical. I gave it to my elderly mother, who has a difficult time reaching and turning on lamps. It was perfect for her. This is a nice and simple lamp at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: A. Caudle

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good quality my knobs over turn abd skip click ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good quality my knobs over turn abd skip click to turn on light... good light source and true to photos. Slight flaws. Easy assemble.....did this help?
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Looks great 5 minutes to assemble Sturdy Each housing is adjustable ...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Looks great 5 minutes to assemble Sturdy Each housing is adjustable Cons: No main switch for the entire unit. Either have to connect to a switched outlet or turn each off manually. Didnt come with bulbs
customer_reviews.author: Frank Serianne

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This lamp comes in a compact little box that surprised me. It was quick and easy to assemble, and has impressive weight and sturdiness! Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: got him another for college, those rooms are so dark
customer_reviews.text: for that kid who needs light...perfect... just remember buy the LED bulbs, so it doesn't get overheated
customer_reviews.author: SpankyBuns

customer_reviews.title: Low quality, ok for a dorm room or temporary living
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this and it gives great light. However after a few months .. and even with changing the bulbs, two of the lights began to flicker constantly and annoyingly. To me this is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon B.Top Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color sent
customer_reviews.text: Good lighting but sent wrong color. Wanted nickel finish and got white. Too much trouble to return. Gave away. Not happy with quality control!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: just us

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp
customer_reviews.text: A nice replacement to an old black lamp I had. The translucent globes let plenty of shine through. I like that I can turn the lights on individually. It fulfills it's purpose and fits in with the decor on my sun porch.
customer_reviews.author: Lorri Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp but not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: 2 out of the 3 lights went out today (yes I checked the bulbs and even replaced them). Bought this in March 2016. Shame - it was a good lamp and totally adjustable. Would have liked it to last longer than a little over a year though.
customer_reviews.author: xefthimiax

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good study product... can be maneuvered as per requirement to adjust direction of light..... good price.... no complains
customer_reviews.author: Kartikey Dave

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: had to return it as it was damaged but it seem flimsy
customer_reviews.author: Titch1973

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice my wife loves it. She would have preferred a shiny finish on the shades.
customer_reviews.author: Donald L

customer_reviews.title: The globes look like glass. Nice finish over all
customer_reviews.text: Very classy looking. The globes look like glass. Nice finish over all. Cord is at the bottom. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Skorupa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Using this with grow lights. Worked well for that all last winter.
customer_reviews.author: M. Spears

customer_reviews.title: Works as I intended.
customer_reviews.text: I use the top two sockets with grow lights pointed to my house plants to supplement light, and the bottom with a 60 watt reading light.
customer_reviews.author: Patsydoodle

customer_reviews.title: Loving the lamp!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp! It was easy to assemble, and the shades are adjustable to point in almost any direction I would want. Despite its low price, it doesn't look cheap, and I really like the brushed metal look. It is perfect for the purpose for which I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Elinor

customer_reviews.title: A stylish lamp
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp to put on my parent's living room. They absolutely love it. It's stylish and light up the room very well. The set up was easy (the instruction manual is well written). Also, the three light sockets are adjustable, so you can adjust them however you want (the sockets can go up and down + the socket holders can rotate clockwise or counterclockwise). Moreover, each light has its own switch, so you can adjust your light intensity. Needless to say, i am a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Kannan

customer_reviews.title: Great stand-up lamp for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great stand-up lamp for the price. I put it in a dark room, my office, which had only one window and no overhead light. It lights up the room and I like the fact that I can adjust the light, point it wherever I like, and with three different light heads. I can tone it down by turning off one or more lights when needed. Perfect for my needs!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy L. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble and really looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and really looks nice. It is just as described. And saved a few pennies compared to price at box store for a similar but not as solid item.
customer_reviews.author: scooter

customer_reviews.title: Gives off good light for cross-stitching
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit together correctly, it lists a bit. Gives off good light for cross-stitching, though. Heavy enough to be steady but light enough to move around easily to where I need it.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Spears

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp, easy to setup, perfect to supplment light in a room
customer_reviews.text: I've bought 4 of these because they work really well, are easy to setup, and the lights can be moved to direct light in any direction. They are modern and get lots of positive feedback. seems like they will last awhile!
customer_reviews.author: Zach Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Service - exactly as expected - excellent value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Critical Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Nice light
customer_reviews.text: This puts out good light. You can easily adjust each light to desired spot. Easy and lightweight to move and clean around. Seems solid.
customer_reviews.author: Alex in Springfield

customer_reviews.title: works great in the corner behind my couch
customer_reviews.text: works great in the corner behind my couch, i love that you can move the lights to point them the way you want them to go.
customer_reviews.author: Johnna M. Redmon

customer_reviews.title: I love the fact that the shades are plastic
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that the shades are plastic, My previous lamp had glass and everything broke in the South Napa Earthquake. This lamp gives great lighting choices. I'd by it again if I needed it.
customer_reviews.author: jean conran

customer_reviews.title: Crooked threading
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly but pipe threading was crooked and made the whole lamp crooked. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Frank M Peters

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp, worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice lamp. It went together quickly and puts out lots of light. I wanted something inexpensive for the office to connect to the outlet controlled by the wall switch and this fits the bill. I would recommend this lamp.
customer_reviews.author: BookLuver

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality! Can't beat this.
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this floor lamp! Sturdy and well made, and I LOVE how the bulbs can be maneuvered to various angels versus most that is just up & down. This can be moved left and right in addition! Totally would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Mai Der

customer_reviews.title: Satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: Works as designed and good enough quality. Would have paid more if glass globes were included instead oof plastic. But still very satisfied for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Quality_Amazon_Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Substanial
customer_reviews.text: Just as pictured. Very nice and feels substantial for the price
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice lamp for the price. Works perfect for where I needed it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy construction
customer_reviews.text: this tree lamp came ready to assemble, which was quite simple. Great sturdy construction. it is very easy to change position of each lamp. would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: ELIZABETH from Queens, NY

customer_reviews.title: Assemble Easley.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together lights up a room very well.
customer_reviews.author: Mr two cents

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: Attractive lamp for directing light to different specific areas of a room. Good quality for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Howard stockett

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, good price, extra light
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my hide away room,,, doesn't take up much space, works properly and meets my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Grey Boy

customer_reviews.title: They love it. They can see now
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our ting cubby hole office for our doctors at our clinic for the working uninsured. They love it. They can see now!
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Tree lights pole lamp
customer_reviews.text: This is a great light my only problem is one of the turn knobs is broken off.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita Potter

customer_reviews.title: works great.
customer_reviews.text: Using for LED Flood Grow lights on indoor plants for the winter.. works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Nice Eclectic Floor Lamp
customer_reviews.text: This was a nice purchase. I needed something in a silver tone and an adjustable option as it gets so hard to see sometimes. This has worked out great and added so nicely to my décor!
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Easy toput together
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Good looking in the living room. The white shades allows lots of light.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Greco

customer_reviews.title: Just love this lamp!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp. First, the price ***** Durable, not flimsy. Easily assembled and finally a great adjustable lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gives a lot of light but cane bent however use outside in sunroom so I am keeping it I have another and it was just fine
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really like it for my daughters room
customer_reviews.text: Really like it for my daughters room! Easy to assemble and a good space saver. I wish it had one more light though, I feel like her room still isn't as bright as I would like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great light, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing in the corner of our living room, my husband was always complaining he couldn't read his newspaper at night. Easy to assemble! My husband is thrilled too.
customer_reviews.author: MarlaPR

customer_reviews.title: Good light for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product and quite sturdy. The white covers are not as cheap looking as some of the other lights I have seen. Very easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: saloni patil

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice tree lamp
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice tree lamp. It does not bend to the side which I like. Looks more expensive than it was.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friend. She loves it. Brightens her living room, and the color matches her decor nicely
customer_reviews.author: Elisa

customer_reviews.title: works great in a college
customer_reviews.text: College student loves it. works great in a college dorm
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: attractive, quick to assemble, seems durable
customer_reviews.text: Unwrapping (from impressively small package) and assembling took less than 10 minutes. Looks good, neutral enough to fit different kinds of decor. Have only used for a few days but seems well-built, sturdy. I like that the "cans" allow some light through the sides, really allows it to light up a section of a room well (vs whole room with standard lamp or just spots with lamp like this with metal cans). I'm using some 52W halogen bulbs ("75W-equivalent") and it's plenty bright. I use it for reading and with Windhover's sunrise outlet timer to simulate a nice sunrise to wake me up very morning. Will update if I have any trouble with it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel T. Thorpe

product_meta.title: Boston Harbor TL-TREE-648 Three Lights Tree Lamp, 65", Satin Nickel
product_meta.description: Boston Harbor Tree Lamp, 3-Light, Adjustable, 60 W, A19 Bulb, Arbitrary Shape, Satin Nickel Lamp, Spot Beam, 45 deg Pivot, 350 deg Rotate Beam, 65 in Height, UL Listed. Boston Harbor 3 Light Satin Nickel Tree Lamp. The three light tree lamp is the perfect lighting to use for any room. The lamp stands at an overall height of 65" is easy to assemble. Finished in satin nickel with three adjustable spotlights. The spotlights can rotate 350 degrees and pivot 45 degrees to provide light wherever you need it. Each light has its own on/off switch. Uses three 60 watt maximum A19 incandescent bulb (sold separately).
feature_bullets: Boston Harbor 3 light satin nickel tree lamp

Spotlights can rotate 350 degrees and pivot 45 degrees
Banned in the State of CA
